website_summaries.verdict: One of the most comprehensive modeler tool kits that's aimed at beginning and experienced builders.
pros: All tools contained in the kit consist of environmentally friendly materials
Includes a cutting mat and sandpaper for precision work
All tools are packaged in a sturdy plastic box
With 27 pieces, you'll always have the right tool on hand
cons: Build quality of a few of the tools is not as high as we'd like to see

customer_reviews.title: Cheap container but good amount of tools for price
customer_reviews.text: So after using the cutters for the first time and putting then back in the box, they caused the box to shatter in one corner because they are just a bit too wide for the box and the plastic is thin/cheap so minus a star for that. The polishing bar also sorta melted a bit, but that was probably my fault? Overall, for what you're paying, this is a great kit to get started with models.
customer_reviews.author: Trish G

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I got into GUNPLA crafting , so i looked into getting a kit. this one comes with so much! it had as many tweezers, blades, sanding tools, and other small tools to help me get started. so far the kit comes with quality blades and I'll be looking to purchase even higher quality tools in the future based on this kit. I'd definitely recommend for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Basic kit for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a simple kit so I could build a model with my son. This had just what we needed some tweezers, exacto knife, and various sanding tools. This is great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 yr old grandson who is starting to build model airplanes...nice kit that comes with storage box....I did warn his parents that it has a couple of very sharp tools with it.....
customer_reviews.author: Pitsy

customer_reviews.title: Gundam model kit is a packed full of everything needed
customer_reviews.text: Gundam model kit is packed full of every tool necessary for your customizing model needs. Everything from various sizes in files to multiple shapes and designs for the tweezers. Excellent quality and price for the complete kit.
customer_reviews.author: Surf dude

customer_reviews.title: A quality and comprehensive tool kit
customer_reviews.text: I needed tools for my son to build Gundam models. This kit contained everything he needed. I was very pleased with the quality of the tools, especially the side cutters.
customer_reviews.author: d. clayton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for any model kit. Has multiple sets of tweezers and files and the nippers are perfect for removing pieces from trays.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a pretty inexpensive kit, the products and supplies are well made and useful for models and miniatures. I would recommend this as a starting point and add your own pieces, like a pin drill, more exacto knives, super glues, etc.....
customer_reviews.author: dragonsworn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My Son and I used it to put together a model car and everything works the way it should and have all the things I needed to help make the build easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Has all the modeling essentials. Pretty generic tools but they get the job done! If youre looking for an inexpensive kit, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: CoDy M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic modeling tool kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tool kit for building models. A plastic tote is filled with files, flush cutters, and assorted other modeling nice to haves.
customer_reviews.author: tmwalsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent collection of small tools
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for as a beginner in the world of making small items.
customer_reviews.author: Anne F

customer_reviews.title: Good for starters
customer_reviews.text: This was my first kit for my first build, it had everything I needed. My only complaint is the panel liner pen did not work as I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my first gunpla kit and for the price it’s fantastic. I’ve only used 2 of the pieces so far because I’m new to this but it comes with so much. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Packaging needs work
customer_reviews.text: The sandpaper was a packed a little weird other than that this kit is amazing. my son said he scraped off a bit of sandpaper trying to get his tools out of the package but he loves this kit. it’s perfect for his model kits
customer_reviews.author: Patty Black

customer_reviews.title: Very good modeling tool set
customer_reviews.text: Just about every tool you might use to advance you skills of model construction to an expert level. It's in there.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a nice bag. The pieces are a wonder to work with and make building models so much easier. Was extremely pleased with the variety of items and the smoothness of use.
customer_reviews.author: milani

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need get started in gunpla! I am really loving this kit
customer_reviews.author: Kody t

customer_reviews.title: Great for modeling.
customer_reviews.text: Great tools for modeling! Great price for all that is included. And fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe gilroy

customer_reviews.title: Good item but needs a new case
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Just about everything needed for models. Only complaint is the clear case was broken
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Every thing came. All came nicely together In the plastic box. Would buy again and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starter kit
customer_reviews.text: I needed parts to start building my gunpla and this had everything I needed to get started plus some stuff that’s even more helpful now that I’m getting more into customizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: These tools are perfect for my son and his Gundam assembly. I especially like the sprue cutters. Might borrow those when I’m working on some of the smaller pieces of my 1/100 tank kits!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good value if you like building models of any type. I ordered a second one for one of my other kids i was so impressed by it
customer_reviews.author: Jason & April

customer_reviews.title: Complete and ready to build
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners in gundam models and also loves gundam in any series or in particular. And building your own and favorite gundam are fun and so satisfying when its finished.
customer_reviews.author: mark anthony ramiro

customer_reviews.title: I love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Its every thing you need to start in the munchers hobby and its grate if you have been in the hobby awhile like me
customer_reviews.author: John Ray Goudelock

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get what was shown
customer_reviews.text: This is all I got from this product It’s not even the right type of sand paper from the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Little complaint
customer_reviews.text: I would of liked if the metal files where in individual covers so they wouldn't hadescratched some of the tools
customer_reviews.author: Arian

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent beginning kit for people just getting into building gundams.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Justin Routledge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything there to get started on a Gunpla build right away.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyrocketfingers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It is a good buy did find a better one but I had already purchased this one. It's still a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: After using them for the first time I found that it comes with a good variety of tools to help in building any model
customer_reviews.author: Luis65339

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all models
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for all model skill levels. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Prieston

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to start building gunpla. The nippers are nice and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Mann

customer_reviews.title: Quality tools at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Quality tools. All that is needed in a tool kit for model making. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

product_meta.title: Gundam Tools Kit Esoca 28Pcs Gunpla Tools Gundam Model Kit Tool Bandai Tool Kit Gundam Modeler Basic Tools Craft Set for Gundam Model Building Repairing and Fixing
product_meta.description:
Color:28pcs Gundam ToolsEsoca gundam model tools give a hand to you to build and assemble the gundam quickly. 

Product details: 
❃ Cutting pliers：As a common tool for modeler, side cutter can cut down model accessory easily, scientific oblique design, knife edge bite neatly and strongly, can cut small things thing easily. 
❃ Craft Knife: Aluminum grip precision craft knife set with safety cap comes with 5 super sharp blades, clamp the blade tightly, non-slip handle design, high hardness. 
❃ Tweezers: 5 style, Anti-static, not easy to get rusty, can hold small parts, the tip is pointed. 
❃ Polished bar: Remove traces and make the model surface smooth，2 style blush bar, such ad 4 size sanding paper(#320, #800, #1200, #2000). 
❃ File: High quality carbon steel file, high hardness, no deformation, wear-resistant and no rust, smooth handle, uniform grain surface, grinding quickly. 
❃ Model separator: When you assemble the model wrongly or joint imperfectly, the model separator can easily take apart the model. You can also put sandpaper on the back to polish the model. 

100% money back guarantee: 
☎ If you have any question, please feel free to contact us with Email, we will give you a satisfactory reply with 24 hours. 

Package Include: 
◆ 1Pcs x Cutting mat
◆ 
1Pcs x Graver
◆ 1Pcs x Side pliers
◆ 1Pcs x 5Pcs spare blade
◆ 1Pcs x Separator
◆ 1Pcs x Steel rule
◆ 1Pcs x Polishing Block
◆ 1Pcs x Polishing cloth
◆ 2Pcs x Screwdriver
◆ 2Pcs x Double-sided polished bar 
◆ 4Pcs x Sanderpaprs
◆ 5Pcs x Tweezers
◆ 5Pcs x Files

Note: 
◆ Because the Modeler Basic Tools are very shape, please use carefully, and take them away from children.
feature_bullets: ✅ PREMIUM QUALITY: Gundam model building kit is made of safe and environment-friendly material, non-toxic and no peculiar smell. Elaborate techniques make every tool solid enough, durable enough, and sharp enough.

✅ LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: Gundam tool kit is lightweight. When you use them, you will feel more handy. Packaged in a plastic box in case of damage, easy to carry and store, you can build your gundam anytime and anywhere. Looking forward to your masterpiece!

✅ FULL RANGE & COST EFFICIENT: Modeler basic tools includes : 4 x sandrpapers, 1 x cutting mat, 1 x side pliers, 2 x screwdriver, 5 x files, 1 x separator, 1 x steel rule, 1 x polishing block, 2 x double-sided polished bar, 5 x tweezers, 1 x graver and 1 x 5 spare blades, 1 x polishing cloth. Meet all beginner’s basic requirements.

✅ DURABLE: Trimmer pen is tightly clamped and has high hardness, plastic handle, and anti-skid design. With safety protection cap to protect blade. The cutting pliers is made of carbon steels, good durability. The tweezers are made of high strength stainless steel, anti-static, anti-acid, anti-corrosion and anti-magnetic. Other items also have high quality.

✅ APPLICATION: The hobby tool kit for models is suitable for a beginner and advanced modeler as well. You can use it to manufacture toys, cars, robots, cartoon, and other crafts. You can also present it as a gift to those friends who need it at any special festivals or on any special days!
